titles.title: Recognizing the 10th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam Women's Memorial.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 10/17/2003--Introduced. Recognizes: (1) the important contributions of women who served in the U.S. armed forces during the Vietnam War; and (2) the 10th anniversary of the dedication of the Vietnam Women's Memorial.
